comment: Custom converter to convert a JSON value to VoltScript array
commentblock: &lt;div class=&quot;description&quot;&gt;	&lt;ul class=&quot;blockList&quot;&gt;		&lt;li class=&quot;blockList&quot;&gt;			&lt;div class=&quot;comments&quot;&gt;&lt;!-- comment --&gt;&lt;pre&gt;Custom converter to convert a JSON value to VoltScript array&lt;/pre&gt;&lt;/div&gt;			&lt;hr /&gt;		&lt;/li&gt;	&lt;/ul&gt;&lt;/div&gt;
commenthtml: Custom converter to convert a JSON value to VoltScript array
inlinecomment: &apos; Custom converter to convert a JSON value to VoltScript array

methods.label: fromJson
methods.comment: Overridden function. The fromJson method is called from AbstractJsonConverter&apos;s deserialize method.
methods.codesample:
%REM
The following code is an abbreviated version of code in AbstractJsonConverter.deserialize. It calls the derived class&apos;s fromJson function and passes the result to AbstractJsonConverter.deserializeToProperty
%END REM
Sub deserialize(holder as JsonConversionHolder, source as JsonObject)
   Call deserializeToProperty(holder, fromJson(source), source.label)
End Sub
methods.signature: Public Function fromJson(source As JsonObject) As Variant
methods.commentblock: &lt;div class=&quot;description&quot;&gt;	&lt;ul class=&quot;blockList&quot;&gt;		&lt;li class=&quot;blockList&quot;&gt;			&lt;div class=&quot;comments&quot;&gt;&lt;!-- comment --&gt;&lt;pre&gt;Overridden function. The fromJson method is called from AbstractJsonConverter&apos;s deserialize method.&lt;/pre&gt;&lt;/div&gt;			&lt;hr /&gt;		&lt;/li&gt;	&lt;/ul&gt;&lt;/div&gt;

methods.codesamplehtml: %REM&lt;br /&gt;The following code is an abbreviated version of code in AbstractJsonConverter.deserialize. It calls the derived class&apos;s fromJson function and passes the result to AbstractJsonConverter.deserializeToProperty&lt;br /&gt;%END REM&lt;br /&gt;Sub deserialize(holder as JsonConversionHolder, source as JsonObject)&lt;br /&gt;   Call deserializeToProperty(holder, fromJson(source), source.label)&lt;br /&gt;End Sub

methods.label: toJson
methods.comment: Overridden function. The toJson method is called from AbstractJsonConverter&apos;s serialize method.
methods.codesample:
%REM
Calls a customConverter&apos;s toJson method to convert an element in an array (arrayVal) to a JSON-compatible scalar.
The code is an abbreviated version of code used in various places, including JsonArrayConverter.toJson().
%END REM
If Not customConverter is Nothing Then
    Call returnObj.appendToJsonArray(customConverter.toJson(arrayVal))
End If
methods.signature: Public Function toJson(source As Variant) As Variant
methods.commentblock: &lt;div class=&quot;description&quot;&gt;	&lt;ul class=&quot;blockList&quot;&gt;		&lt;li class=&quot;blockList&quot;&gt;			&lt;div class=&quot;comments&quot;&gt;&lt;!-- comment --&gt;&lt;pre&gt;Overridden function. The toJson method is called from AbstractJsonConverter&apos;s serialize method.&lt;/pre&gt;&lt;/div&gt;			&lt;hr /&gt;		&lt;/li&gt;	&lt;/ul&gt;&lt;/div&gt;
methods.commenthtml: Overridden function. The toJson method is called from AbstractJsonConverter&apos;s serialize method.
methods.inlinecomment: &apos; Overridden function. The toJson method is called from AbstractJsonConverter&apos;s serialize method.
methods.codesamplehtml: %REM&lt;br /&gt;Calls a customConverter&apos;s toJson method to convert an element in an array (arrayVal) to a JSON-compatible scalar.&lt;br /&gt;The code is an abbreviated version of code used in various places, including JsonArrayConverter.toJson().&lt;br /&gt;%END REM&lt;br /&gt;If Not customConverter is Nothing Then&lt;br /&gt;    Call returnObj.appendToJsonArray(customConverter.toJson(arrayVal))&lt;br /&gt;End If

arguments.label: source
arguments.comment: Scalar or array variant containing serialized value
arguments.commentblock: &lt;div class=&quot;description&quot;&gt;	&lt;ul class=&quot;blockList&quot;&gt;		&lt;li class=&quot;blockList&quot;&gt;			&lt;div class=&quot;comments&quot;&gt;&lt;!-- comment --&gt;&lt;pre&gt;Scalar or array variant containing serialized value&lt;/pre&gt;&lt;/div&gt;			&lt;hr /&gt;		&lt;/li&gt;	&lt;/ul&gt;&lt;/div&gt;

arguments.inlinecomment: &apos; Scalar or array variant containing serialized value

methods.label: withCustomConverter
methods.comment: Passes a custom converter to this JsonArrayConverter. The converter will be used to convert each element in the array to a VoltScript object rather than a scalar or scalar array.
methods.codesample:
%REM
Converts a JSON object with an array of dates, converting each element in the array to a ZuluLSX DateTimeObject. The arrayConverter is mapped to the &quot;modified&quot; property of the JSON object, but the dateConverter just needs to run on each element in the array. So a label to look for does not need to be passed.
%END REM
Dim dateConverter as New ZuluDateTimeSerializer()
Dim arrayConverter as new JsonArrayConverter()
Dim helper as New JsonConversionHelper
Dim jsonString as String
Dim obj as ObjectSummary
jsonString = |{&quot;unid&quot;:&quot;12345678901234567890123456789012&quot;,&quot;modified&quot;:[&quot;2023-02-01T13:00:00Z&quot;,&quot;2023-02-01T13:15:12Z&quot;,&quot;2023-02-02T09:00:00Z&quot;]}|
Call helper.withCustomConverter(&quot;modified&quot;, arrayConverter.withCustomConverter(dateConverter))
Set obj = helper.fromJsonString(jsonString, &quot;ObjectSummary&quot;, &quot;ObjectClass&quot;)
methods.signature: Public Function withCustomConverter(converter As AbstractJsonConverter) As JsonArrayConverter
methods.commentblock: &lt;div class=&quot;description&quot;&gt;	&lt;ul class=&quot;blockList&quot;&gt;		&lt;li class=&quot;blockList&quot;&gt;			&lt;div class=&quot;comments&quot;&gt;&lt;!-- comment --&gt;&lt;pre&gt;Passes a custom converter to this JsonArrayConverter. The converter will be used to convert each element in the array to a VoltScript object rather than a scalar or scalar array.&lt;/pre&gt;&lt;/div&gt;			&lt;hr /&gt;		&lt;/li&gt;	&lt;/ul&gt;&lt;/div&gt;

The arrayConverter is mapped to the &quot;modified&quot; property of the JSON object, but the dateConverter just needs to run on each element in the array. So a label to look for does not need to be passed.&lt;br /&gt;%END REM&lt;br /&gt;Dim dateConverter as New ZuluDateTimeSerializer()&lt;br /&gt;Dim arrayConverter as new JsonArrayConverter()&lt;br /&gt;Dim helper as New JsonConversionHelper&lt;br /&gt;Dim jsonString as String&lt;br /&gt;Dim obj as ObjectSummary&lt;br /&gt;jsonString = |{&quot;unid&quot;:&quot;12345678901234567890123456789012&quot;,&quot;modified&quot;:[&quot;2023-02-01T13:00:00Z&quot;,&quot;2023-02-01T13:15:12Z&quot;,&quot;2023-02-02T09:00:00Z&quot;]}|&lt;br /&gt;Call helper.withCustomConverter(&quot;modified&quot;, arrayConverter.withCustomConverter(dateConverter))&lt;br /&gt;Set obj = helper.fromJsonString(jsonString, &quot;ObjectSummary&quot;, &quot;ObjectClass&quot;)
